reviews.review: Es un vicio

Всем привет.Я только купил эту игру,играю не очень,но,вроде,стало что-то получаться и даже выигрывать стал за маньяка,но...Есть одно большое НО.Тут жёсткий дисбаланс.Мне после частых побед стали попадаться 2-9 ранги с 1 к часов игры,а мне куда с 17 или 16 рангом с ними играть и 18 часами? Исправьте,чтобы к тем,у кого нет 10 попадались 10-20,а не 3,которые очень хорошо играют.Причём ладно бы,если один такой в команде сурвов был,но нет,там целый сквад из высоких рангов.Ещё минус этой игры-токсики.Они высирают после проигрыша или выигрыша что-то в чате.

怎么说呢

I'm not going to write that in depth review of this game, but if you want a summary here it is: if you are playing with friends and you get this game on a sale, it can be worth it.

On the other hand, (which is a lot) because of all the predatory game model they have(half of the meta killer perks being locked behind a pay wall and those people that constantly mention the shrine of secrets when it takes about 20 hours to develop enough shards for a single perk and it is hit or miss for what will be in the shrine), also after every game getting harassed by the game asking for you to buy the premium rift pass and hanging the rewards in your face consistently, is just annoying and predatory. 

I own all of the dlc but I still dislike the model they have in place.

The toxicity of this community on the forums and in-game is ridiculous. This is the most toxic community, I have ever seen, and hell I played gta online.



As well as the stuff that the community have been asking for to be reworked or nerfed/buffed for a long, long, time, that have been left unsolved by the developers is shoddy.

This is only scratching the surface of the reason why I dislike this game and do not recommend it.

tldr: don't buy this game unless it is on sale and you are playing with friends.

Игра в стиле "4 выживших и маньяк".
Выжившим надо сообща чинить генераторы, чтобы сбежать от маньяка.
Маньяку нужно принести в жертву как можно больше вышивших, не давать чинить генераторы и ломать их.
Итог: Играть за бегунов нужно сообща, и желательно со связью. За маньяка, ну тут уже от куда руки растут ;)
杀机最出色的地方，个人认为是在保留竞技的原味同时，将单纯的胜负淡化，而是通过血点分数制保留双方的游戏体验，玩家的戾气在我看来会小很多。作为不足10小时的萌新，很多时候两方都是互相失误以示尊敬（doge），但就我个人而言完全没有因为初期白给而产生退游的想法，而是每局尽可能的周旋博弈，结束后在血网研究技能搭配（惊骇蛋糕永远滴神！）；这可能就是把非对称的魅力发挥到极致吧。

I played Dead By Daylight when it first came out, stopped playing, then came back maybe a year ago when I heard it was getting popular - and wow! The team behind DBD is really dedicated to consistently updating and perfecting the content here. The horror/strategy here definitely is more focused on strategy than horror - I rarely found myself scared in this game, but it's mind games with the enemy (especially when you're faced against a powerful Killer - who's likely a famous horror pop culture icon!) that make the game shine. If you and your friends need a new game to play and sink your teeth into, I highly recommend Dead By Daylight.

PS - I'd love to see Jack from The Shining or The Terminator in here. A Shining or Terminator DLC would be an instant buy from me!

Not friendly to newbies , the playability increases along your gaming hours and skills.
~ (местами забавно)
nice

Yeah the games alright, can be pretty fun with friends, but you have to deal with one of the most toxic community's out there, Killer getting the most toxicity thrown at them, so if you cant deal with that kinda thing this game isn't for you, the game also takes lots and lots of grinding. The game is also mostly pay to win, if you want good perks you need to buy the survivors/killers, then grind by playing the game, you get most blood points from killing survivors/sacrificing them, and Escaping as survivor. You then buy perks through the blood web, those perks will be random and you will not always get what you want, so depending on what perk you want, will depend on how lucky you are in the webs, but if you grind long enough you will probably get the perk you are looking for. The game does take practice and will get harder and harder as you rank up, the higher rank you are the harder/ more toxic the game will become, making it deterring for some players. The game is skill based so you will want to practice as much as you can. All in all the game is pretty fun to play depending on what your play style is and who you play with/against.

An appallingly toxic community, long queues and bad matchmaking make this fun game frustrating and sad.

The community is half normal and half disgusting. Naturally you not remember the normal half, but disgusting half will scream at you, teabag and mock wherever possible. 
I once had a player say: “I hope your grandma dies of Covid” After a long tirade of why I was a 'bad at the game – piece of shit , etc, etc'

I find it very had to have fun in these kinds of environments, but if you can handle that then by all means play.

¿Quieres divertirte? Pues no lo compres
Para mi este no es un juego que te pueda divertir ya que es demasiado competitivo, las probabilidades de ganar como superviviente son súper nulas al principio, primero invertirle unas 50 horas y con suerte aprenderás a modificar un personaje con sus habilidades pero para lo demas no (apenas y gane el tutorial de no quedarme dormido de reparar el motor) cuando recién lo compre estaba súper emocionado y ahora estoy súper decepcionado, y se me hace una burla de que te lo cobren medio caro por algo que puede ser fácil un juego free to play, y una cosa más, si quieres ser el asesino debes de jugar SOLO, no puedes divertirte jugando con un amigo.
----
EN CONCLUSIÓN:
Si solo te vienes a divertir con tus amigos te recomiendo Friday the 13th (aunque no lo he jugado pero espero que sea mejor que este)

>eu já havia comprado dead by daylight antes
>mas na época não tinha achado muito divertido
>então resolvi reembolsar
>até que uns dias atrás, fiquei com vontade de jogar 
>decidi comprar o jogo com algumas dlcs dessa vez
>uns dias atrás
>vi que tinha um cara mexendo no meu gerador
>ele tava agachado perto de umas árvores
>comecei a ir na direção dele
>ele começou a gritar e fugir de mim
>corri rapidamente atrás dele
>finalmente consegui alcançar
>dei-le uma facada
>foi só uma e ele já caiu
>caiu igual fezes no meio do gramado
>fui embora
>cheguei em casa agora
>finalmente posso iniciar o dead by daylight sem preocupação

По началу игра может показаться немного не понятной и сложной, но после часа и более проведённого в ней вы всё больше и больше понимаете суть и развиваетесь в игре. Мне нравится такой жанр игр, хоть по моему профилю это и не скажешь. В Dead By Daylight можно весело провести время с друзьями, и в соло с разными людьми. Большой плюс игры это разнообразие персонажей и их особенностей. Много различных карт и иногда становится по настоящему не по себе. Рекомендую к покупке)
